voice.text: Passages to Darashia, Venore, Liberty Bay, Port Hope, Yalahar and Edron.

parameter.value: Good bye. Recommend us if you were satisfied with our service.
Good bye. Recommend us if you were satisfied with our service.
I'm known all over the world as Captain Sinbeard.
Welcome on board, |PLAYERNAME|. Where may I sail you today?
